DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is compare the pharmacokinetic characteristics of DP-R206 (150mg Ibandronate / 24,000 IU Vitamin D3 complex tablet, qd) and Bonviva (150mg Ibandronate, qd) after oral administration in healthy adult volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Pharmacokinetic Characteristics of DP-R206 in Healthy Adult Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The number of patient is eighty-four. Patients were randomly assigned either a Bonviva tablet(150mg Ibandronate, qd) first, DP-R206(150mg Ibandronate / 24,000 IU Vitamin D3 complex tablet, qd) Second or DP-R206(150mg Ibandronate / 24,000 IU Vitamin D3 complex tablet, qd) first, Bonviva tablet(150mg Ibandronate, qd) second.
DOC.criteria: 20 to 55 years of healthy volunteers Hypersensitivity Reaction about Ibandronate or other drugs(aspirin, antibiotics)
